DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to investigate the possible clinical effect of dexamethasone on the action of sugammadex when it is administered to reverse deep neuromuscular blockade caused by rocuronium in laparoscopic cholecystectomies.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Dexamethasone on the Action of Sugammadex
